author: Josephson
content: Bullish: Financial Institutions have accumulated MSFT stocks in recent days. MSFT is under-valued. Be patient. Don't sell. Buy more today and After Hours; MSFT will break 52-week high sooner than expected

author: Steve
content: Bullish: A stock split is a sign of management confidence.  Let's get a 4-1 split done before the end of the year!

author: Okay
content: Bearish: sales and eps of msft is a big red flag. This is going to crash upcoming earnings and big institutions have already sold 3% stake out of 10%.

author: Daniel
content: Bearish: Compared to other big Tech MSFT has been a severe underperformer for most of the year.  I have other opportunities that look better so after many years I am moving on.

author: Scott
content: Bullish: Buybacks, potential stock splits and Ai growth on the horizon. Seems like waiting around for the CEO to speak after hours today 👀

author: DINO
content: Bearish: WHITE COLLAR CRIME PAYS AND PAYS VERY HANDSOMELY!!

author: Lulu
content: This stock is heading for negative territory ytd in a bull run year for the market and is apparently a leader in ai. They need to double their buybacks to 120b for several years in a row.

author: Wayne
content: Comparing MSFT to NVDA? Apples and oranges. Both are great, but Microsoft is a safer, long-term bet.

author: Kali
content: The $60B buyback program should put a floor under the stock. Shorts better watch out!
